entry.title: 吴说获悉，据彭博 ETF 分析师 Eric Balchunas ，Cathie Wood 在 BBTV 上谈论出售 GBTC 持仓时表示，“GBTC 存在税收和监管方面的不确定性，我们不知道谁会获得批...
entry.summary:
吴说获悉，据彭博 ETF 分析师 Eric Balchunas ，Cathie Wood 在 BBTV 上谈论出售 GBTC 持仓时表示，“GBTC 存在税收和监管方面的不确定性，我们不知道谁会获得批准。我们知道我们已经满足了标准，但我们不知道其他人的情况。而且折扣幅度也显着缩小，这对我们来说是双重好处” 。https://www.wublock123.com/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=show&catid=6&id=22106
吴说区块链: 吴说获悉，彭博分析师 Eric Balchunas 发推称，ARK 出售了其全部剩余 GBTC 头寸（这是 ARKW 一个月前最大的持股），并用大约 1 亿美元的一半资金购买了 BITO，很可能作为流动性过渡工具。BITO 是 2021 年 10 月 ProShares 推出的比特币期货 ETF。https://www.wublock123.com/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=show&catid=6&id=22106

Jim Bianco: When has the Fed cut rates in a Presidential election year? entry.title: RT Mudit Gupta: The ledger issue is now fixed. To make sure you don't have the malicious library cached, go to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/...
entry.summary: RT Mudit Gupta The ledger issue is now fixed. To make sure you don't have the malicious library cached, go to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/connect-kit@1 and ensure the version is 1.1.8. If it's not, clear your cache. chrome- F12> Chrome Developer Tools > Application tab > Storage in left tree> Clear site data.

entry.title: An underappreciated feature of @ChainEDGE_io smart money is our evm cross chain data. For example on $WOLF we noticed $28k of smart buys over the past...
entry.summary: An underappreciated feature of @ChainEDGE_io smart money is our evm cross chain data. For example on $WOLF we noticed $28k of smart buys over the past 3 days (since launch) at an average price of $0.00000068. The token trades at $0.00002774 or 40x higher

entry.title: RT REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺: Basically every single file on Ledger Live has user trackers in them I've cleaned a bunch and there's still 310 files Ledg...
entry.summary:
RT REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺 Basically every single file on Ledger Live has user trackers in them I've cleaned a bunch and there's still 310 files Ledger REALLY wants to know what you're doing on Ledger Live. Every click, every keystroke, every thing you look at gets tracked, logged and phoned home to… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732542258698694875
REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺: Cleaning user tracking code from Ledger Live code and JFC the whole thing is a gigantic user tracking system There's analytics trackers for nearly all events, on most screens. Ledger Live is a user data collection tool How is this system even accepted by the crypto community?
